Html:
Will this package create files that can be used with Excel Services on Moss 2007. Currently we are using the ExcelPackage that creates an XLSX file, but it wil not load with excel sevices on our SharePoint server/ Have tried to load a spreadsheet into Excel services?

Thanks

I havent got access to a MOSS server at the moment, but reading the documentation this should be possible. You could start with a fiel that works with MOSS as a template and then make changes, instead of starting from scratch.

Please let us know the outcome.
This should be possible since this library is using the SDK to create the files. I will test it on Monday and give feedback on here.

As I understand this code, I am using this code to convert csv and tab delimited files into xslx files that would work in excel services.

Would I still use a template as a starting place in the above scenario?

Thanks for your help.

From: jameswestgate <notifications@codeplex.com>
To: Kevin Ogborne
Sent: Fri Sep 18 06:03:01 2009
Subject: Re: MOSS 2007 Excel Services [simpleOOXML:69285]

From: jameswestgate

I havent got access to a MOSS server at the moment, but reading the documentation this should be possible. You could start with a fiel that works with MOSS as a template and then make changes, instead of starting from scratch.

Please let us know the outcome.
